alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 10:00PM MST until October 15 at 10:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 1045 PM MST. * At 1000 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Estrella Mountain Ranch, or 12 miles southwest of Goodyear, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Goodyear, Buckeye, Palo Verde, Painted Rock Dam, Liberty, Perryville, Rainbow Valley, Hassayampa and Arlington. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 112 and 119. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 135 and 154. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
